title: Tommy Gibson
text:
Thomas Gibson was a Scottish professional <a href="Association%20football">footballer</a> who made over 180 appearances as a <a href="Full%20back%20%28association%20football%29">full back</a> in the <a href="Football%20League">Football League</a> for <a href="Nottingham%20Forest%20F.C.">Nottingham Forest</a> and <a href="Captain%20%28association%20football%29">captained</a> the club. He also played in the <a href="Scottish%20Football%20League">Scottish League</a> for <a href="Heart%20of%20Midlothian%20F.C.">Heart of Midlothian</a> and <a href="Morton%20F.C.">Morton</a>.
Personal life.
Gibson served as a <a href="company%20sergeant%20major">company sergeant major</a> in the 1st <a href="Football%20Battalion">Football Battalion</a> of the <a href="Middlesex%20Regiment">Middlesex Regiment</a> during the <a href="First%20World%20War">First World War</a> and held the rank of <a href="Warrant%20Officer%20Class%20II">warrant officer class II</a>. He was partially buried by a <a href="Shell%20%28projectile%29">shell</a> explosion <a href="Battle%20of%20the%20Somme">on the Somme</a> and developed <a href="shell%20shock">shell shock</a>.
